m_szDocSumamry: Japan Times latest articles The latest news from Japan Times, Japan's leading English-language daily newspaper Japan becomes fourth nation to test-fly homegrown stealth jet The Defense Ministry says the unarmed prototype, called X2, took off from Nagoya airport in Aichi Prefecture early on Friday. Two killed as bridge beam falls at construction site in western Japan Two workers died and eight others were injured Friday when a 113-meter-long, 1,350-ton bridge beam under construction above a national route in Kobe, Hyogo Prefecture, ... Government panel supports use of digital textbooks in Japan
